No clinical trial examine efficacy treatment patient population , although certain study show active ovulation induction effective woman unexplained infertility , cycle fecundity improve normally cycle woman active ovulation management program artificial insemination . The significance information may help elucidate mechanism low-dose clomiphene citrate may improve fecundity patient unexplained infertility currently use empirically .
